documentation.text: @dev Helper function to handle both ETH and ERC20 payments
@dev Helper function to handle both ETH and ERC20 payments

There are many non-compliant ERC20 tokens... this can handle most, adapted from UniSwap V2
 Im trying to make it a habit to put external calls last (reentrancy)
 You can put this in an internal function if you like.

opcodes: PUSH1 0x80 PUSH1 0x40 MSTORE PUSH1 0x0 DUP1 REVERT INVALID LOG2 PUSH5 0x6970667358 0x22 SLT KECCAK256 GAS CALLCODE SWAP3 0x27 DELEGATECALL SWAP9 0xCA PUSH23 0x105A6F8DF5F5B403437E29D0678A4104C79F74D1B1FC17 POP PUSH5 0x736F6C6343 STOP MOD 0xC STOP CALLER
